title: Obed Wild & Scenic River: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News          News happens all the time in the National Park Service, and the Obed Wild and Scenic River sees its share of it. This page will be devoted to information regarding special events, press releases, the NPS Pass Program, and anything else that would be helpful to our visitors. Please take a look at the news releases, newspapers, and at our Frequently Asked Questions page for important information at the Obed WSR. The Obed Wild and Scenic River is one of more than 400 National Park Service units in all 50 states. Click on News Reports to find out more about what is happening in the news in all of the NPS sites.  Â    .
